definition: to decorate/to embellish/to repair/to build/to write/to cultivate/to study/to take (a class)
scissors/shears/clippers/CL:把[ba3]/to cut with scissors/to trim/to wipe out or exterminate

sentences.english: And we scheduled it and we get it and my dad and my sister would help trim it.
sentences.chinese: 先做安排然後實踐，爸爸和姐姐會幫忙修剪聖誕樹。

sentences.english: Men, as a rule of thumb, should always keep their nails clipped.
sentences.chinese: 男人一般來說都應該保持指甲處於修剪過的狀態。

sentences.english: Keeps hair in nose and ears trimmed to appropriate length.
sentences.chinese: 鼻毛和耳朵修剪到適當的長度。

sentences.english: At a certain point, though, you won't need to prune the tree.
sentences.chinese: 在某個特定的點，然而，你不在需要修剪樹木。

sentences.english: Ribbed trim and removable blue lining at drawstring hood.
sentences.chinese: 羅紋修剪和可移動的藍色襯拉繩罩。

sentences.english: The trees bleed when trimmed after the sap is up in the spring.
sentences.chinese: 春天樹枝含液汁，修剪時會有液汁流出來。

sentences.english: The company's overgrown dealer network will be pruned.
sentences.chinese: 該公司過剩的經銷商網絡將得到修剪。

sentences.english: Do not trim those wisteria vines.
Black quilted tech fabric with tonal felt trim.
sentences.chinese: 黑色絎縫高科技面料與色調感覺修剪。

sentences.english: I will trim my nose hair as often as necessary.
sentences.chinese: 我會按需要經常修剪鼻毛。

sentences.english: Continue to cut the hair upwards cutting at an angle when fade lines are reached.
sentences.chinese: 每到達一條髮際線的時候繼續用斜方剪刀修剪頭髮。

sentences.english: And now it seems to me the beautiful uncut hair of graves.
sentences.chinese: 現在它對於我更像是美麗而缺少修剪的墓地上的髮絲。

sentences.english: Proning grape wines Pruning grapevines must be dong done very carefulycarefully.
sentences.chinese: 修剪葡萄藤必要非常小心。

sentences.english: The husband mows his lawn on Saturdays.
sentences.chinese: 那位丈夫在每個週六修剪草坪。

sentences.english: Front buttoned fastening. Raw-edged trim and seaming.
sentences.chinese: 前面的兩個口袋邊是修剪風格。

sentences.english: Trim toenails straight across using nail clippers.
sentences.chinese: 用指甲刀逐個修剪腳趾甲。

definition: scissors/shears/clippers/CL:把[ba3]/to cut with scissors/to trim/to wipe out or exterminate
to cut off/to cut away/to trim
